text: Scott Thompson (born February 25, 1965), better known by his stage name Carrot Top, is an American stand-up comedian and actor. He is known for his bright red hair, prop comedy, and self-deprecating humor. ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from Florida
title: Carrot Top
